meanings.definition: Having a pleasantly sharp taste or appetizing flavor.
meanings.sent1: The salsa had a piquant flavor that made my taste buds tingle.
meanings.sent2: The chef added some piquant spices to the dish to enhance its flavor.
meanings.sent3: The piquant sauce was so delicious that I couldn't stop eating.
meanings.sent4: Her piquant wit added a flavorful twist to the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The piquant aroma of the dish filled the room, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: Pleasantly stimulating or exciting to the mind.
meanings.sent1: The mystery novel had a piquant plot that kept me guessing until the end.
meanings.sent2: The piquant discussion sparked new ideas and creativity among the team.
meanings.sent3: His piquant sense of humor always lightened the mood in the office.
meanings.sent4: The piquant movie ending left the audience in awe and anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The piquant puzzle challenged my mind and kept me engaged for hours.
